name: Flipped!!
description:
THE GAME WANTS YOU TO LOSE SOME OF YOUR OPTIONS ARE TERRIBLE. YOU MUST EXPERIMENT WITH WHAT IT GIVES YOU AND WORK OUT YOUR OWN STRATEGY.
  • FIGHT - Maybe you'll hit the enemy, maybe you won't! Who knows? There's a counter that heals you for more the higher you count it up!
  • ITEM - HP Potion.
  • FLIP- Flip your HP and MP. Flip and then heal for INCREDIBLE EFFECTS!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move cursor
  • SPACE - Select
  • CTRL - Back
  • F5 - Reset (Sorry, but don't worry, it loads quickly after the first time)

CREDITS:

Some of the sounds and/or music was created by David McKee (VIRiX Dreamcore).

Music: n-Dimensions by Matthew Pablo, Orbital Colossus by Matthew Pablo, That's it For Today by ViRiX Dreamcore.

Ideas by LFOB and BrunoBRS.

Everything else by LFOB <3

Spoilers if you don't want to bother sifting through all the attacks to figure out a strategy (I really do not blame you): USE FLIP AND COUNTER A LOT
